description: Obaba resides near Souryuu City where she raises Dragon type Pokémon like Kibago. She gave Iris a day old hatched Kibago and told her to raise it well so it would be a strong Pokémon. Satoshi asked Iris if Obaba was her Grandma but she replied and told him that she wasn`t but she was one of the greatest and well respected people in her village.
name: Obaba-sama
